name: Zai's Day
description:
A story about a circle name Zai as he is on  his way to retrieve his soup back but in the process finds new people, new places and dark secrets what lies out there Zai well that's up to you...

A visual novel with 8 endings.

when you get a ending refresh the page.

This Game is a comedy but does have small amounts of dark themes.

We put a lot effort and energy into this so please Enjoy!

Sorry there's no music didn't have time to program it in :(

This is a browser game.
